channel.title: Madeline Miller on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Madeline Miller on Strat

item.title: Circe
item.description: Madeline Miller, the first and the greatest of the authors writing Greek mythology fan fiction, like the hammer of Hephaestus, strikes again. Circle rewrites the story of, well, Circe who you may have seen in Homer’s Odyssey. It was fantastic and I’m excited to read her previous novel, the Song of Achilles.
